full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS PA'I CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RTA GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHIN NYAMS NAS NYAM THAG LA, BYAMS PA'I SEMS KYI KUN NAS BSLANGS TE THA SHAL SMYON PA'I SPYOD YUL CAN, SU TI KARMA MING CAN GYIS, SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI  LA NOR KHRUL BYUNG NA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA CHAGS SO, ,BDAG LA SGRIBS PA MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DGE BAS 'GRO KUN DBUL SDUG BSNGAL DANG 'BRAL NAS MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYES PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE ZHING 'PHEL BA DANG BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR RGYAS PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
